product_name: Darn Tough Rugby Mid-Calf Light Socks
long_description: Upgrade your sock collection with the Rugby Mid-Calf Light Socks from Darn Tough. Soft merino wool, seamless construction and fun style take these casual socks way beyond basic. Merino wool/nylon/spandex fabric blend is soft and breathable while providing light cushioning and the perfect amount of stretch. Merino wool supplies light insulation and continues to insulate even when damp; merino wool is also naturally odor-resistant. Darn Tough Rugby Mid-Calf Light Socks feature seamless construction to reduce blisters and chafing.
short_description: Upgrade your sock collection with the Rugby Mid-Calf Light Socks from Darn Tough. Soft merino wool, seamless construction and fun style take these casual socks way beyond basic.
